SEO_TITLE: Branch IEEE UNTELS with more than 13 years at the National University of Technology of Lima Sur.
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the IEEE UNTELS Student Branch, a student organization that promotes the professional and personal development of students at the National University of Technology of Lima Sur.
INTRO_TITLE_AFTER_BR: to the IEEE UNTELS Student Branch
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: The IEEE UNTELS 2024 student branch is a non-profit student organization that seeks to promote education and research in electrical, electronic, computer engineering and related fields.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Our goal is to promote the professional and personal development of students at the National University of Technology of Lima Sur, through academic, technical and social activities.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: Join us and be part of the IEEE community!
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_1: The IEEE UNTELS Student Branch was founded in 2008 and since then has worked on the organization of academic, technical and social events for students at the National University of Technology of Lima Sur.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_2: Our goal is to promote the professional and personal development of our members, through activities that promote education, research and innovation in the field of electrical, electronic, computer engineering and related fields.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_3: Join us and be part of the IEEE community!
BENEFITS_DESCRIPTION_1: By joining the IEEE UNTELS Student Branch, you will have the opportunity to participate in a variety of academic, technical and social activities, which will allow you to develop your professional and personal skills.
BENEFITS_DESCRIPTION_2: In addition, you will have access to resources and tools that will help you complement your academic training, such as publications, conferences, online courses and volunteer opportunities.
BENEFITS_DESCRIPTION_3: Join us and take advantage of all the benefits that the IEEE community has to offer!
ACTIVITIES_DESCRIPTION_1: The IEEE UNTELS Student Branch organizes a variety of academic, technical and social activities, which seek to promote the professional and personal development of its members.
ACTIVITIES_DESCRIPTION_2: Among the activities we carry out are conferences, workshops, courses, technical visits, competitions, social events and much more.
ACTIVITIES_DESCRIPTION_3: Join us and participate in our activities!
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION_1: If you have any questions or would like more information about the IEEE UNTELS Student Branch, please do not hesitate to contact us.
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION_2: You can send us a message through our social networks or complete the contact form on this page.
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION_3: We will be happy to assist you!
CONTACT_FORM_SUCCESS: Thank you for your message! We will contact you as soon as possible.
